text: I am using custom paper to print a document but when I use the fop to create the pcl file I am getting the following warning: "Paper type could not be determined. Falling back to: Legal". The page width is 3in and the page height is 2in, do you know if what I am trying to do is possible? Is there a configuration file to tell PCL renderer the paper size?
creator: dohko82@gmail.com
gadams@apache.org
text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
not a bug; please post an inquiry to "FOP Users" <fop-users@xmlgraphics.apache.org> for general user support questions
